Many congratulations buddy :-) Hope you have a good time

_________________=
_______________

From: archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com
[mailto:archive-craw=
ler@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of Micah Wedemeyer
Sent: Monday, April 07, 2=
008 7:51 PM
To: archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [archive-crawler] =
The Heritrix effect



Hey all,

I just wanted to let everyone know about s=
omething that has happened at
my work that I've dubbed "the Heritrix effect=
."

We've used Heritrix on several projects, and we really love it.
However=
, in each case, it's only a matter of weeks or months before the
developer =
involved moves on to a new, more exciting job. I am the
fourth person that =
this has happened to. I had been working with
Heritrix 2.0 for about two mo=
nths when I got an e-mail out of the blue
offering me my dream job at a hot=
 internet startup.

Surely it's only a coincidence, but then again... ;)

M=
icah

P.S. Thanks to the archive.org developers for all their hard work on
=
Heritrix. It really is an amazing tool.
